comments.body: `required=False` is the default value and not required to be passed explicitly. Applies to other places as well.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +237,241 @@    module = AnsibleModule(
        argument_spec=dict(
            pn_cliswitch=dict(required=False, type='str'),
            state=dict(required=True, type='str',
                       choices=['update']),
